text: Leon Daelemans (born 18 April 1949) is a former Belgian cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Belgium Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Belgium) Category:People from Neerpelt
title: Leon Daelemans
